title: Cloud 9 Commercial Grade Mega Party Bouncer Double Slide Castle Bounce House - 100% PVC 22' x 15' Bouncer - Inflatable Only
features: Total inflated size is approximately 22 x 15 x 12 feet.
Requires a 1200 watt blower for use. Blower not included.
Complies with the Lead Free Toys Act.
Color, fun bounce house with side-by-side slides
description: Cloud 9â€™s commercial-grade Mega Double Slide Bounce House is a large inflatable bounce house. Constructed from heavy-duty, 100% PVC vinyl, from its upright pillars and beams to its slide walls. All high-stress areas, including the bouncing surface, mattress sides, bottom, and slide are made from industrial strength, 18-ounce (0.55mm) PVC. This (fire retardant and lead-free) puncture-proof PVC material is approximately 5 times stronger than the nylon used in lesser-quality units. The PVC will not tear, fade, get moldy, and is far easier to clean. For increased stability, additional belting reinforcement is found at key stress points, and heavy-duty, multilayer stitching is used throughout. Zippered flaps allow the bouncer to be quickly deflated and taken down for storage. Includes: Instructions, Repair Kit with Patches, 4-ounce Bottle of Glue, and Four 12" Heavy-duty Metal Ground Stakes All materials comply with the Lead Free Toys Act.  Make sure bounce house is secured to the ground prior to use. Never use in windy or other inclement weather. Grade: Premium - Suitable for rental/commercial use Capacity: Approximately 8 children (1200 pounds in total) Dimensions: Approximately 12' tall measuring 22' x 15' at its base Please Note: A blower is required for use and is not included. Always use GCFI-protected receptacles/circuits and take caution to keep blower and power cords in dry locations.
